snippet: A troubling bout of defensive lapses tripped up Miami in its loss to the Knicks, who routed the Heat for the second straight time.
abstract: Miami Heat fail to ratchet up their defense to stop 112-92 defeat by New York Knicks at American Airlines Arena in Miami, ending their 12-game home winning streak.
lead_paragraph: A troubling bout of defensive lapses tripped up Miami in its loss to the Knicks, who routed the Heat for the second straight time.

headline.seo: Heat, Slack on Defense, Endure Their First Home Defeat
headline.main: Poor Defense Costs Heat Their First Home Defeat
headline.print_headline: Poor Defense Costs Heat Their First Home Defeat
